About this item

  • Advanced Active Noise Cancelling: Professional noise cancellation technology quells airplane cabin noise, city traffic or a busy office, makes you focus on what you want to hear, enjoy your music, movies and videos
  • Superior Sound Quality: 40mm large-aperture drivers deliver Hi-Fi stereo sound quality with deep bass and crisp treble. Perfect for enjoying music, watching movies, and making calls
  • 30 Hours Playtime: Up to 30 hours playtime in Bluetooth mode, enough to get you through a long journey. Quick charge gives you 2 hours of playtime from just 5 minutes of charge
  • Comfortable Protein Earpads: The protein earpads simulate human skin texture, ensuring lasting comfort. 90° swiveling earcups and adjustable headband allow you to find the perfect fit
  • Built-in Microphone & Wired Mode: High-quality built-in microphone enables hands-free calls. 3.5mm audio cable included allows you to use the headphones in wired mode when battery runs out

Product Description

Experience premium audio quality with our state-of-the-art wireless Bluetooth headphones. Designed for music enthusiasts and professionals alike, these over-ear headphones combine advanced noise cancelling technology with exceptional comfort for all-day wear.

The active noise cancelling feature uses advanced algorithms to detect and eliminate ambient noise, allowing you to immerse yourself completely in your audio. Whether you're commuting on a noisy train, working in a busy office, or traveling by plane, these headphones create your personal sound sanctuary.

With a remarkable 30-hour battery life, you can enjoy uninterrupted listening throughout your day. The fast-charging feature means you're never without your music for long - just 5 minutes of charging provides 2 hours of playback time.

Comfort is paramount in our design. The soft protein earpads gently cushion your ears, while the adjustable headband ensures a perfect fit for any head size. The 90° swiveling earcups make storage easy and add to the overall comfort during extended wear.
